content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --DTC
      operator: empty
    - name: --ENDTC
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: FDA.VALIDATOR.SD0024
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when --ENDTC is provided and --DTC is missing
Outcome:
  Message: Missing value for --DTC, when --ENDTC is provided
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: FDA
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: FDA Validator Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: SD0024, Publisher ID FDAB043
              Version: '1'
            Version: '1.5'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Date/Time of Collection (--DTC) should not be NULL,
                  when End Date/Time of Observation (--ENDTC) is not NULL.
                Document: FDA Validator Rules v1.5
                Section: Validator Rules
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
      - FINDINGS ABOUT
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --ENDTC is provided and --DTC is missing

Outcome.Message: Missing value for --DTC, when --ENDTC is provided

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Date/Time of Collection (--DTC) should not be NULL, when End Date/Time of Observation (--ENDTC) is not NULL.
